body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Star Auto Care customer service. My name is Alicia Johnson. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is John Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm calling about my recent service experience at your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Could you please provide me with your contact number so I can review your file?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is six five zero, four five eight, two one one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I also have your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, John. I'll look into your concerns and get back to you as soon as possible.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you again for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
